label: English 🇬🇧
lang_set: Okay! Language is set to english!

errors.admin: You need administrative privileges to do this

ban.ban:
User @{username} was banned
He/she won't be able to return to the chat
ban.tban:
User @{username} was banned for {time}
He/she will be able to return to the chat after time expiration
ban.unban:
User @{username} was unbanned
Now he/she can return to the chat

kick.kick:
User @{username} was kicked
He/she will be able to return to the chat

perms.restrict: User @{username} was restricted of all user permissions
perms.permit: User @{username} was granted full user permissions
perms.permit_default: User @{username} was granted default user permissions

greeting.kick_bot:
User @{username} failed bot check.
It was kicked
greeting.other_user_err: You can't pass other user's bot check

introduction.start:
Hello! I'm administrative bot for a chat!
From this moment I will help in this chat.
For correct work you should give me administrative privileges.
Please choose language. This will affect all bot's messages.
introduction.help:
Command list:
/tr - Translate message. /tr <language code>
/notes - Show notes list
/note - Show note
/addnote - Add note. /addnote <note name>
/delnote - Delete note. /delnote <note name>
/mute - Mute user forever
/tmute - Mute user for time. /tmute <quantity><s/m/h/d>
/unmute - Unmute user
/ban - Ban user forever
/banme - Ban user who wrote this command
/tban - Ban user for time. /tban <quantity><s/m/h/d>
/unban - Unban user
/kick - Kick user
/kickme - Kick user who wrote this command
/restrict - Restrict user of all user permissions
/permit - Grant user full user permissions
/dpermit - Grant user default user permissions
/demote - Demote user
/purge - Delete all messages between this and replied to message
/promote - Promote user
/weather - Show current weather. /weather <location>
/forecast - Show weather forecast for a week /forecast <location>
/setgreeting - Set greeting for new chat members
/rmgreeting - Remove greeting for new chat members WARNING! If chat doesn't have a greeting, then bot check will be disabled!
/setleavemsg - Set user leave message
/rmleavemsg - Remove user leave message
To use some of these commands that can apply to user, you should reply command to user message

notes.instruction: You can retrieve these notes by using /note <note name> or #<note name>

forecast.other_user_err: You can't control other user's forecast menu
